mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_remind ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, school_brokerage_sa_id, visa_id, brokerage_sa_id, remind_date, state) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{schoolBrokerageSaId}, #{visaId}, #{brokerageSaId}, #{remindDate}, "ENABLED");
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, school_brokerage_sa_id AS schoolBrokerageSaId, visa_id AS visaId, brokerage_sa_id AS brokerageSaId, remind_date AS remindDate, state FROM b_remind WHERE remind_date < #{date} AND state = "ENABLED" ORDER BY remind_date DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_remind WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
DELETE FROM b_remind WHERE school_brokerage_sa_id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
